title: Hazelnut and salted caramel chocolate tart
ingredients: ['Hazelnut pastry', '50g blanched hazelnuts', '200g plain flour', '1 tablespoon icing sugar', '140g butter, diced', '1 egg yolk', '1 to 2 tablespoons cold water', 'Salted caramel', '75g caster sugar', '1 to 2 tablespoons water', '25g butter', '100ml double cream', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '1 large pinch sea salt flakes', 'Chocolate fudge filling', '100g dark chocolate (70% cocoa solids)', '75g butter', '2 large eggs', '1 egg yolk', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', 'Finishing touches', '300ml double cream', '1 punnet strawberries', '50g blanched hazelnuts, chopped', '50g milk chocolate', '1 tablespoon icing sugar']
